item.title: 安全策略
item.description: 已知漏洞 Even though there is no known security vulnerability in go-mail, you can always check the security advisories page of our GitHub project. 报告漏洞 To report (possible) security issues in go-mail, please either send a mail to security@go-mail.dev or use Github’s private reporting feature. Reports are always welcome. Even if you are not 100% certain that a specific issue you found counts as a security issue, we’d love to hear the details, so we can figure out together if the issue in question needds to be addressed.
